name: Astroblitz
overview: As captain of a fast-moving rocket plane, your mission is to make the planet safe by destroying all the dangerous objects on its surface and in its atmosphere. Score as many points as possible by shooting down Spinners., Saucers, Seekers and Radar dishes. Navigate your ship carefully to avoid being hit by enemy fire and strange alien objects! Avoid the spewing volcanoes and save the friendly buildings.
